item.title: Running Pre-Built Binaries on Non-FHS *NIX Systems
item.author: nasirhussainm14@gmail.com (Nasir Hussain)
item.description: Executing pre-built binaries on a new system can be a troublesome task to perform. Several exceptions can occur causing the execution to fail. We’ll be looking at one of such that can occur on Linux systems quite often, which is: The file '<executable_file_name>' does not exist or could not be executed. This exception occurs when it is unable to find one of the ELF libraries required to execute the binary.
